title: [GAMEPLAY] Elementalist Lux being able to choose the same first form again.
body:
On Lux, When you are able to choose a second form the option to choose the same form again is available. 

How to recrate this bug.

1. Get enough elemental power to be able to choose a second form.
2. Choose the same form again (Which should not be possible) 


I have tried this in 3 diffrent games 2 on live servers and one in the practice tool. When i chose the same form again in normals i got the same form for the whole game. When i did it in the practice tool i became the nature form instead when i chose the fire form again as i did in the video. 

It looks like i edited the video but it was the same game.

replies.body: Riot's aware of this and should have it fixed for next patch. It's due to some UI changes that were made.
